data.description: 3.125% FIXED INTEREST RATE ASSUMABLE FINANCING AND NEW PRICE OPPORTUNITY!  This Martin Ray plan is a beautiful, well-appointed and spacious home located in the incredible premier 55+ community of Sun City Peachtree (“SCP”). SCP features a clubhouse, fitness center, meeting rooms, as well as swimming, tennis, golf, pickle ball and numerous other clubs and activities for the homeowners. SCP has a security-welcoming entrance for guests and homeowners have access to gated entrances with security entry features. This home is less than 2 years old featuring a spacious 2-car/golf cart area garage, in addition to (1) a leaf gutter protection system; (2) a monitored security system and Ring video doorbell; and (3) Smart House features include (i) an extra-large wiring panel for increased WIFI capability, (ii) a wireless Honeywell Thermostat, (iii) a wireless Schlage Smart Deadbolt Keyless Entry lock and (iv) 8 WIFI ethernet ports. For increased comfort and energy efficiency there are 6 designer ceiling fans with lights and wall/portable-remote controls. Floors are durable wood-look luxury vinyl planks in the foyer, kitchen, walk-in pantry, dining area and owner’s entry; upgraded carpet and pad in bonus/flex room, great room, primary bedroom and guest bedroom. The kitchen features all stainless-steel appliances including a direct hood vent to the exterior and a gas stove with a large convection/air-fry oven. There is an abundance of granite countertops in the kitchen along with numerous cabinets for storage, and an amazingly large island easily seating 5-7 people. This home features an expansive gathering room leading into an airy sunroom. The main bedroom is spacious with a generous walk-in closet, a roomy bathroom featuring a separate tiled walk-in shower and an oversized soaking tub. The beautiful well-manicured front and backyards are maintained by the HOA. Outside is private backyard featuring a large patio stubbed for a gas grill. Call today for a showing!
